key_risk_themes: ["Security Vulnerabilities in Critical Auth Flows","Reliability of Asynchronous Distributed Processes","Performance of Critical Path Middleware"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Mandate security code reviews for all authentication and authorization logic.","Configure Dead-Letter Queues with immediate alerting for all event-driven workflows (registration, password reset, deletion).","Deploy Redis in a Multi-AZ configuration and implement robust monitoring."]
